participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about music, Emily is determined and optimistic about her future.
participant_1.background: I dream of playing music for a living. Mom in telecommunications. Both my parents are creative. I am a student living at home while pursuing my music industry degree. My dad works in the automotive industry.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and outgoing, Jake loves to take on challenges and enjoys sharing his passions with others.
participant_2.background: I was a champion downhill skier in college. My sister is a published author. I vacation in Florida every winter. I sing karaoke every Thursday night.

content.text: Hi there! I'm [participant_1].
Hi, I'm [participant_2].
What do you do for fun?
I sing karaoke every Thursday night. Do you like to sing?
I love to sing! I'm a music student and I dream of playing music for a living.
That's awesome! What instruments do you play?
I play the piano, guitar, and I'm learning the drums.
Wow, you're really talented!
Thank you! I've been playing music since I was a little kid.
What kind of music do you like to play?
I love to play all kinds of music, but my favorite is probably rock and roll.
I love rock and roll too! What are some of your favorite bands?
I love The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, and Led Zeppelin.
Those are some great bands!
I know, right? I love their music.
So, what are you working on right now in your music studies?
I'm working on a new song that I'm really excited about. I'm hoping to record it soon.
That's great! I'd love to hear it when it's finished.
I'll let you know!
Great! It was nice meeting you, [participant_2].
It was nice meeting you too, [participant_1].
